title: Machida GION Stadium
text: The is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Machida%2C%20Tokyo">Machida, Tokyo</a>, <a href="Japan">Japan</a>. It is also known as because it is located in . It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and also sometimes for <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> and <a href="Athletics%20%28sport%29">athletics</a> events. This stadium has a <a href="seating%20capacity">seating capacity</a> of 15,489.
